definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Then you may need natural eye-drops .
sentences.chinese: 那你需要天然的眼药水。

sentences.english: If necessary, suction off the droplets using an eyedropper or syringe.
sentences.chinese: 如有需要，用眼药水瓶或注射器吸取液滴。

sentences.english: A gas chromatographic technique tor the analisys of sodium succinate has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 用气相色谱法测定眼药水中琥珀酸钠的含量。

sentences.english: I dripped a few eye drops into my eyes.
sentences.chinese: 我往眼睛里滴了几滴眼药水。

sentences.english: Can be pseudomyopia treated with eyedrop ?
sentences.chinese: 假性近视可以用眼药水治吗？

sentences.english: When talking to a good friend of mine, he recommended natural eye-drops.
sentences.chinese: 后来一个朋友推荐我用天热眼药水。

sentences.english: I just used the eyedrop that makes me look lik…
sentences.chinese: 因为刚刚滴了眼药水，所以你会觉得我哭了。

sentences.english: HKAPES said most eye-drops contained preservatives that were harmful to eyes.
sentences.chinese: 该协会说，大部分眼药水包含防腐剂，对眼睛有害。

sentences.english: They may not take care of their eyes with such things as eye drops.
sentences.chinese: 他们可能不会用眼药水之类的东西来照顾自己的眼睛。

sentences.english: When you keep your eyes skinned , you'll find it to be a counterfeit eyewash.
sentences.chinese: 你要是留意，就会发现这是一种伪造的眼药水。

sentences.english: He wants me to try these new more powerful eye drops.
sentences.chinese: 他让我去试试这些新的更有作用的眼药水。

sentences.english: These eye drops can bring on asthma symptoms, including cough.
sentences.chinese: 这类眼药水可诱发包括咳嗽在内的哮喘症状。

sentences.english: Does eyeball of dot eyedrop cross-eye have profit?
sentences.chinese: 点眼药水对眼睛有没有好处？

sentences.english: These eyedrops are very effective in treating conjunctivitis.
sentences.chinese: 这种眼药水对治疗结膜炎很有效。

sentences.english: If your eyes are even a bit irritated, try natural eye-drops.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的眼睛会发红，试一试天然眼药水。

definition: dry eye/xerophthalmia (drying of the tear glands, often due to lack of vitamin A)
cosmetic contact lens/big eye contact lens/circle contact lens
Yaksu in North Korea, near the border with Liaoning and Jiling province
